tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_data (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  customer_address VARCHAR(100),
  waste_collection_day VARCHAR(10),
  account_balance DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    zip_code VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection (
    pickup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    pickup_date DATE,
    waste_type VARCHAR(50),
    waste_weight DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CollectionSchedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  bin_id INT NOT NULL,
  collection_day VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  collection_time TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(100),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_bins (
    bin_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bin_location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT,
    customer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection (
    collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bin_id INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    collected_weight DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (bin_id) REFERENCES waste_bins(bin_id)
);

CREATE TABLE service_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    collection_id INT,
    feedback VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES waste_collection(collection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_bins (
  bin_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT NOT NULL,
  last_emptied TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_schedule (
  schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  bin_id INT NOT NULL,
  collection_day VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  collection_time TIME NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE collection_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id INT NOT NULL,
  collection_date DATE NOT NULL,
  collection_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
  customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  preferred_collection_day VARCHAR(20),
  preferred_collection_time TIME,
  notification_preference VARCHAR(20)
)
